name: mothergoose
description: A mongoose wrapper that provides a template for reusable dal level operations. CRUD functionality. Includes easy to use mock / stub database to speed up test development and minimize dependencies and errors
readme:
mothergoose
===========

A mongoose wrapper that gives you a template for reusable dal level operations. Comes packaged with CRUD functionality. Also Includes an easy to use mock / stubbed database to speed up test development and minimize dependencies and errors.
